directions: Pass cabbage, fennel, apples, celery, lemongrass, and ginger through a juicer. Transfer juice to an airtight container; cover and chill until cold.
Just before serving, add baobab powder to juice and stir until dissolved. Divide juice among glasses.
ingredients: 1 small green cabbage, outer leaves removed, cut into thin wedges
1 medium fennel bulb, cored, cut into quarters
1 lemongrass stalk, tough outer layers removed, root end trimmed (pale-green parts only)
title: Green Juice with Baobab Powder
